name: Gas Pos
headline: Modern Point of Sale for Gas Stations and Truck Stops
description: We have taken an incredibly monopolized, overpriced, asset-heavy industry and flipped it on its head by providing a better, modern, affordable alternative with more functionality on a SaaS model.

founders.name: Cameron Hogan, Founder
founders.description: Recovering lawyer turned Serial Entrepreneur across several industries.

#### Gas Pos: Fuel POS + EMV Pumps For Gas Stations & truck Stops Across USA 
With the Gas Pos Equipment as a Service Program, you will receive the fastest-growing fuel point of sale system, EMV fuel dispensers, and the most advanced back office software for gas stations & truck stops.
[EMV Pumps + POS](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/gas-pos-emv-pump-program-page>)
### Fastest-Growing Fuel Point of Sale System For Gas Stations & Truck Stops across USA
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_a190d91ec60c4e909aa745c59ebab7d5~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_804,h_665,al_c,q_90,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/7c6454_a190d91ec60c4e909aa745c59ebab7d5~mv2.png)
[Watch Demo](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/watch-gas-pos-demo>)
### Receive EMV Gas Pumps, Modern Fuel Point of Sale System, Advanced Back Office, And Save Significant Sum of Money With Dual Pricing Program
![Image \(4\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_d2f47eedf172447f8e3c15d20fd72fa7~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_72,h_68,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Image%20\(4\).png)
[Fuel Pos + EMV Pumps](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/gas-pos-emv-pump-program-page>)
### POS + DEF Pump + DEF Tank + Diesel DIspensers For Truck Stops. Make 300% More Net profit than selling jugs inside the store
Home: Contact
![gaspos updated 1 \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_010b24d154c44607bcbd712c611a4d4b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_80,h_72,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/gaspos%20updated%201%20\(1\).png)
[New DEF Tank + Pumps](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/gas-pos-def-program>)

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_86cc74b9c1f04866a41231090b15b06b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_48,h_17,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7c6454_86cc74b9c1f04866a41231090b15b06b~mv2.png)
[Find Out More](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/gas-pos-portable-aboveground-station>)
### Launch a New Gas Station For 1/3 the Cost Compared to Ground-Up Construction. Receive a New Convenience Store, Portable AboveGround Tank, Pumps + POS
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_07c328d795b94fedb29e84d5cdf8bc60~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_18,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7c6454_07c328d795b94fedb29e84d5cdf8bc60~mv2.png)
[ Launch a New Gas Station](https://gaspos.co/<https:/landing.gaspos.co/launch-new-gas-station-page>)
### Advanced Back Office For Gas Stations & Truck Stops
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_239a0ac66d4a4923900a96ece13fa8e0~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_82,h_53,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7c6454_239a0ac66d4a4923900a96ece13fa8e0~mv2.png)
[Advanced Back Office](https://gaspos.co/<https:/www.gaspos.co/back-office-gas-station-truck-stop>)
![2 \(3\).jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7c6454_17dccff06905447ba8cbf18cab931238~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_147,h_93,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7c6454_17dccff06905447ba8cbf18cab931238~mv2.jpg)
Gas Pos is the fastest-growing equipment as a service program for gas stations and truck stops across USA. You will receive a modern cloud-based point of sale system & EMV fuel dispensers, all for a low monthly fee + Gas Pos Merchant Services. Depending on which program you join, you may not even end up paying a monthly fee.
Here's the equipment you'll receive with Gas Pos:
Touchscreen, cash drawer, printer, pole display, scanner, CPU, software, pricebook, inventory, cloud based, fuel controller, web portal, and new EMV fuel dispensers.
​
Includes manufacturer's warranty. Salesperson will provide specific warranty information on each program.
We can customize your gas pumps with your colors/logos.
Free 24/7 US-based helpdesk automatically included. 
The Gas Pos Promise:
NO expensive point of sale upgrades NO support fee hikes NO maintenance fee hikes
​
Additional Truck Stop POS Options: You can accept fleet cards with the Gas Pos truck stop point of sale system. This includes over-the-road (OTR) cards such as Comdata®, Comchek®, Wex, Multi Service, Voyager, Fleet One, QuikQ, T-Chek, EFS, Fuelman & more. 
​
Both truck stops & gas stations can also accept the credit card brands including Mastercard, Visa, American Express, Discover, as well as debit cards, EBT & loyalty cards.
​
We can provide your truck stop or diesel lane with a DEF Storage Tank, DEF pump, diesel dispensers, so you have the newest DEF & diesel technology.
We're more successful when you're more successful. That's how the Gas Pos business model is set up, and that's what drives our company. Start a conversation at 1-800-209-1241 Ext 1 to join convenience stores, gas stations, diesel lanes & truck stops across USA.
Send

Birmingham, AL

generated_description:
**Gas Pos: Revolutionizing Fuel Point of Sale Solutions**

Founded in 2015 and hailing from Little Rock, AR, Gas Pos was born out of a desire to disrupt a traditional, monopolized industry considered asset-heavy and overpriced. The company emerged as a breath of fresh air by offering a modern, affordable Point of Sale (POS) system tailored specifically for gas stations and truck stops. Their mission? To provide a better alternative wrapped in a SaaS model that integrates robust functionality without breaking the bank.

As part of Y Combinator Batch W20, Gas Pos has swiftly carved out its niche in the fintech and B2B sectors. With a lean team of 15, the company is focused on delivering top-notch services to its clients, ensuring that truck stops and gas stations alike can seamlessly manage their operations.

### What They Do
Gas Pos offers an Equipment as a Service Program that encompasses:
- A modern cloud-based POS system with EMV fuel dispensers
- Advanced back office software 
- Customization options for branding

Their services go further, allowing convenience stores to transition into gas stations with portable above-ground tanks and modern fuel POS systems, thereby launching new stations at a fraction of traditional costs. The flexibility of their offerings empowers users to maximize profits, particularly with bespoke solutions for both gas and diesel sales.

### Why It Matters
Gas Pos stands out in a largely homogeneous market by promising a transparent and supportive experience:
- No surprise maintenance fee hikes
- No expensive upgrades
- Free 24/7 US-based helpdesk support

The business model is structured to ensure shared success; when their clients flourish, so does Gas Pos. They’ve positioned themselves as partners to their customers, fostering a cooperative relationship aimed at mutual growth.

### Connect with Gas Pos
For those in the gas station and truck stop sector looking for a game-changing POS solution, Gas Pos is ready to lead the charge. You can find more information or get started on their website: [Gas Pos](https://gaspos.co). 

With a clear mission and innovative approach, Gas Pos isn’t just a service provider—it's a vital ally in modernizing the fuel industry. The future of gas station operations is here, and it’s all about efficiency, affordability, and functionality.
